# Simple version

```{r simple}
library(tiDML)

fit <- dml_plr(
  mtcars,
  y = "mpg",
  d = "am",
  x = c("cyl", "disp", "hp", "drat", "wt", "qsec", "vs", "gear", "carb"),
  m_model = "rf",
  g_model = "rf"
) 

print(fit)

```
